author: Reuters
title: Trump pledges new guidelines for states to reopen, suggests U.S. has 'passed the peak' of coronavirus outbreak
description: U.S. President Donald Trump said Wednesday some states will be able to reopen ahead of the previously projected date of May 1. Trump and Vice-President Mike Pence will hold a call with state governors Thursday to discuss details of reopening the economy, he s…
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump said he would announce "new guidelines" for reopening the economy at a news conference on Thursday, after he and Vice-President Mike Pence discuss it with state governors.
Trump also said during his Wednesday news conference that … [+1082 chars]
